column4: I need help force mounting an external hard drive that my friend accidentally removed unsafely.
that's the code I tried to use.
that should work.Have you tried having the usb in while booting?
no. I supposed I should try that.
I might not have created it properly.
what error are you exactly getting?
hold on. I re-created the directory using sudo, which might have been my problem. let me try it again and I'll give you the output.
funny how these things turn out to be simple little mistakes. It worked.
haha tell me about it :) glad to see it works
